website_summaries.verdict: Sturdy iron heats up quickly and is made for traveling thanks to its dual-voltage feature.
pros: Gets hot fast, so there's little wait time
Lightweight and compact for easy travel
Includes travel bag and comes with a 1-year limited warranty
cons: Doesn't have an auto shut-off, and the water reservoir is quite small

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: This is the best little travel iron I've every had. I have had several, this is my favorite. I use it for quilting retreats. Perfect size for travel. It gets REALLY hot, and you can use steam. I would empty the water between retreats, or travel. I didn't with my first one, and after 6 years it finally rusted.
customer_reviews.author: Harp Lover

customer_reviews.title: Heats fast! Off setting in dial, I don't have to uplug to turn off. Heats up fast. Perfect size.
customer_reviews.text: Great iron. Gets hot very fast. Has on/off setting so I don't have to unplug it. I used it to heat stabilizer in the hoop for embroidery. Perfect size for even 4"x 4" hoop. Be sure to get the setting correct for US or overseas voltage, for US it gets way too hot. Getting another. Dropped it. My fault, not the product.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Good iron
customer_reviews.text: My other mini iron died. This iron was a good price. Reviews were good. Has a very long cord!! The only complaint is. Where the cord is attached to the iron. It makes the iron tippy. And I have tipped it over many times.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Convenience
customer_reviews.text: I use it when quilting to press things while at the sewing machine it save the time of getting upvevery time to press something
customer_reviews.author: very satisfied

customer_reviews.title: Handy little iron!
customer_reviews.text: This is a handy little steam iron to have at your elbow when sewing or quilting. I don't have room on my sewing table for a pressing station, so I use the iron on a TV tray right next to me.
customer_reviews.author: Genni RETTKE

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for cross stitch!
customer_reviews.text: I do counted cross stitch patterns and when finished with my stitching, I iron the pieces to get the folds and wrinkles out of the fabric. I can easily maneuver the iron over small fabrics but it is also good on bigger pieces as well. I have not had any issues with water dripping out; the cup that comes with it has a "fill to" line on it and the instructions clearly state how the dial should be set when filling the iron with water. I follow the directions each time I use it and it works great!
customer_reviews.author: Robyn JL

customer_reviews.title: Works very well.
customer_reviews.text: This little iron is just what I had been looking for. I travel a lot and even rolling or folding shirts carefully they always need and iron. It works very well for being so small, it has a steam setting and gets hot enough to iron out all the creases. You have to make sure that it's on the correct steam setting when there's water otherwise your shirt just gets wet.
customer_reviews.author: J F Morris

customer_reviews.title: Works-good value
customer_reviews.text: Works great..used when traveling out of county I stayed at a nice clean hotel, but it only offered ironing in the laundry room, this mini iron worked perfectly for my light weight clothes I packed
customer_reviews.author: LadydiPa

customer_reviews.title: Love this little travel iron.
customer_reviews.text: It is perfect for travel since it is small and light. Even it is so small, it iron clothes pretty good. I give a good recommendation.
customer_reviews.author: Kari

customer_reviews.title: Its got all the options a large iron has and its very easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Impressed with this little thing. Its got all the options a large iron has and its very easy to use. Well made and exactly as described. Very pleased
customer_reviews.author: Brenda W

customer_reviews.title: Works!!
customer_reviews.text: Loved the size and color. Works great by my sewing table.
customer_reviews.author: Reena Scott

customer_reviews.title: Very light iron
customer_reviews.text: I have arthritis in my shoulder and starting in my hands. I don't iron much, but this is perfect for what I need. Very light. Not good for heavy ironing. It's so little that it would take too long.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Schuemann

customer_reviews.title: not worth the $$$$
customer_reviews.text: I know return window has passed but ust want to let you know that when I went to use this iron last night it would not heat up and still today on several tries it does not heat up Very dissatisfied!!
customer_reviews.author: Phyllis St Amant

customer_reviews.title: Great Iron
customer_reviews.text: For a nice travel iron for your craft projects. This one is the best. It has steam along with the heat.
customer_reviews.author: Georgia

customer_reviews.title: It makes it easy to iron small corners
customer_reviews.text: This is the second iron I have purchased. It makes it easy to iron small corners. Great quality; a little work horse!
customer_reviews.author: Penny Hawkins-Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Good 👍iron 👍
customer_reviews.text: This is a good iron i will be doing all my craft 👍👍project with this iron thank you 👍
customer_reviews.author: 1125punky

customer_reviews.title: Great iron for classes
customer_reviews.text: Gresr little iron, had so many people wsnting it at my srwing class.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this tiny iron
customer_reviews.text: Very compact iron. Gets pretty hot fast (cooling is a bit slow though). It comes with a mesh pressing sheet (over the garment to be pressed) that's a nice touch (I was going to buy one). The knobs are a bit flimsy though, not easily turned. This is a good one to have by the craft table for fabric or paper pressing because it takes a lot less space.
customer_reviews.author: Anony MouseTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: Kinda sad
customer_reviews.text: I gave it a 3 because it's a great small travel iron. I loved the bright red color. Seems easy enough to use. Heats up quickly and worked ok. When I put the water in though most of it leaked out. How disappointing. I'm going to have to return it because that's annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Nella

customer_reviews.title: Good if you use it dry but I needed the ...
customer_reviews.text: It's okay but most hotels provide irons, so it's of limited use. Good if you use it dry but I needed the steam and it spit and hissed and got everything wet when I added water.
customer_reviews.author: Shanti Sethi

customer_reviews.title: easy to
customer_reviews.text: Works as expected, use it on our travel trailer, light, easy to store
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: CUTE AND DEFECTIVE!! Dead iron
customer_reviews.text: It totally died two weeks ago SO it lasted in my LIGHT fabric ironing “occasional” (bindings and such) for only a month and a month and a half!! Now I can’t DO anything since it says I cannot return it. Obviously defective they should send me another iron! Now I have to go buy another. That’s what I get for getting a “ cute” one. An 11$ iron would still be working
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Fraley

customer_reviews.title: Love the size.
customer_reviews.text: Love the size and heat of the iron. Palm size and easy to use. So much easier to use than my big iron for those small pieces (quilting pieces) I’m ironing.
customer_reviews.author: M. Benedict

customer_reviews.title: International travel approved!
customer_reviews.text: I do A LOT of international travel and needed an iron since most European hotels don’t have irons. I wanted a travel iron with both 110/220 volts and this fits the bill. This iron never fails me and has become one of my favorite travel companions. I don’t leave home without it.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Craft iron
customer_reviews.text: I like this little iron but I feel it is a little too small. I love that it is red that is the perfect color. It works beautifully and I gave it as a present to my sister and she keeps it on her wool mat right next to her sewing machine. She really likes it.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Hendrix

customer_reviews.title: Red Mini Steam Iron
customer_reviews.text: SMAGREHO Mini Travel Steam Iron with Dual Voltage, Anti Slip Handle and Non-Stick Teflon Soleplate I This mini iron is great for use beside your sewing machine area and also for traveling. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Robin W.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect For Travel
customer_reviews.text: I took this on a two week trip to Italy. It is small enough that it fit easily in my carry on. Worked great! No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Toner

customer_reviews.title: Good little iron
customer_reviews.text: Great little iron. Gets really hot. Only gave it 4 stars because handle gets pretty warm. Would buy again. Use it for quilting.
customer_reviews.author: SandyV

customer_reviews.title: Not from the US!
customer_reviews.text: This came from China. Took a long time. If I would have known this I would not have ordered it.
customer_reviews.author: Charlene Walker

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I've used it for travel several times The steam function is great.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Garrett

customer_reviews.title: Perfect little iron for crafts
customer_reviews.text: Great little iron. I use it for my crafts. Heats up very fast
customer_reviews.author: happy camper

customer_reviews.title: Good iron
customer_reviews.text: Bought this iron for crafting! It’s perfect for what I needed it for
customer_reviews.author: Jessica T.

customer_reviews.title: It's not red
customer_reviews.text: One of the feet was broken off when it arrived and as I live in New Zealand it's not easy to do returns so have had to glue it on and hope it stays on. Also this is NOT RED. It's a wine color so disappointed in that. Otherwise it seems to work just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Reed

customer_reviews.title: Where's that water coming from?
customer_reviews.text: Had to figure it out. You'd think something that small would be super easy. If not handled properly, it leaks everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Carnley

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Neatest little iron ever - perfect for the doll clothes I sew!
customer_reviews.author: buyer

customer_reviews.title: Works perfect for travel!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent, it’s work very well! I am very happy with this little iron!
customer_reviews.author: Katia Ortuno

customer_reviews.title: looks like a mouse
customer_reviews.text: Love it. works great for my sewing box. everyone comments on how cute it looks as well.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: No leaking!
customer_reviews.text: Finally! A perfect little iron! Easy to hold, easy to use, and most importantly, no leaks! I had almost given up that such a device even existed. I love this little iron. Love.
customer_reviews.author: MPD

customer_reviews.title: Great little iron
customer_reviews.text: Great little powerhouse, heats up in seconds and takes up no space!
customer_reviews.author: Jean

customer_reviews.title: I love this iron!
customer_reviews.text: It gets hot very quickly. Light weight Easy to carry Yet powerful enough for my needs Very satisfied
customer_reviews.author: Rui Konno

customer_reviews.title: but it is easy to refill
customer_reviews.text: A real working dynamo! This is a must in a sewing room. I have used it a ton. Only regret is the water vessel does not hold much so steam runs out fast, but it is easy to refill! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Instructions missing
customer_reviews.text: I bought this used, and it didn't come with instructions. They're not written on the box, and I can't find instructions online. I have no idea how to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Piwi Mama

customer_reviews.title: This little guy is awesome! Saves so much time being able to reach ...
customer_reviews.text: This little guy is awesome! Saves so much time being able to reach corners and tight spots for my HTV projects. Well worth the excellent price! I’m buying another as a spare!
customer_reviews.author: QueenbG

customer_reviews.title: The Home Away from Home Iron
customer_reviews.text: Perfect iron when traveling! It's compact lite and does not take much room in you suitcase.
customer_reviews.author: Dale S

customer_reviews.title: Works good
customer_reviews.text: Works great only issue is setting knob is little hard to turn due to it being small, but work good
customer_reviews.author: martin59

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: tine iron is great for travel, ifts snug in my hand.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia . Quinn

customer_reviews.title: Bummer !
customer_reviews.text: I bought this five months ago and I used it on the weekends it now leeks the water when set down to iron and it doesn't get hot anymore. Very disappointed if worked at first lots of fun.
customer_reviews.author: Tiana M. Young

customer_reviews.title: Super cute
customer_reviews.text: REALLY CUTE, It’s tiny so I can keep it in my dorm! And it actually works!
customer_reviews.author: Okayy

customer_reviews.title: This iron fits so neatly inside the most everyday carryon
customer_reviews.text: I love this little iron. I cant wait to pull it out in a place where there is no iron.
customer_reviews.author: Cornelius Cannon

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This little iron is perfect for use with tiny quilt pieces.
customer_reviews.author: IRPlummer

customer_reviews.title: Would definitely recommend for a travel accessory
customer_reviews.text: It works. Took this to Europe and used it with our adapter. It worked, and didn't take up much room in my luggage. Would definitely recommend for a travel accessory.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome little travel iron!
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for camping... love it! Will take it everywhere!!
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Excellent iron at a perfect size!
customer_reviews.text: This iron is perfect for my college dorm and when I travel for my job. It gets just as hot as my full size iron but is a good size and easy to use
customer_reviews.author: KatHR

customer_reviews.title: small yes but love the controls on top
customer_reviews.text: I love it. Small, but the controls are on top and have no trouble with it the other one I have it is hard to turn the dial on
customer_reviews.author: Marian Mendes

customer_reviews.title: Water cup broken
customer_reviews.text: Really light weight but just the water cup was broken, other than that everything looks fine, I haven't try it yet
customer_reviews.author: Luisa Arvizu

customer_reviews.title: mini iron
customer_reviews.text: Gets hot quickly, easily fits into my sewing bag for traveling. Super handy.
customer_reviews.author: Della Latham

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good! I'd recommend it
customer_reviews.text: Comes with everything you would need, a bag, something to pour the water into the iron and a mesh to protect the clothes. Love it. Good size.
customer_reviews.author: Ivelisse

customer_reviews.title: The iron will leak when it is cool and set down on it's ironing plate
customer_reviews.text: Leaks unless the iron is on Max hot. The iron will leak when it is cool and set down on it's ironing plate. It is best when used dry.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie

customer_reviews.title: Great Heater for Travellers
customer_reviews.text: This iron is working very good. For cotton clothes we needed to spray water to get the wrinkles out.
customer_reviews.author: michael

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: This is cute and compact great for traveling. Makes a great gift
customer_reviews.author: msteecheesy

customer_reviews.title: No voltage switch
customer_reviews.text: Mine arrived quickly, thanks Amazon! But the box had been opened and the voltage switch broken. I need it for international travel so back it goes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for travel to quilt retreats
customer_reviews.text: Purchased to take to a quilt retreat. Paper piecing project. Worked great.
customer_reviews.author: CHRISTINE MASSOTH

customer_reviews.title: Best travel iron ever!
customer_reviews.text: Very compact, easy to carry, works wonders on wrinkles from traveling, and heats up nicely. A powerful little iron.
customer_reviews.author: claudia allen- williams

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't get hot enough
customer_reviews.text: We returned this iron because it didn't get hot enough to press out wrinkles.
customer_reviews.author: Richard L Hitt

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: its great for travel, but there are better ones out there
customer_reviews.author: jimmy

customer_reviews.title: Good for travel
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and convenience. Hot very fast and the steam is good for use.
customer_reviews.author: Mollie Pester

customer_reviews.title: It gets hot and presses my quilting pieces great. I’m enjoying it
customer_reviews.text: This little iron fits the bill to a T. It gets hot and presses my quilting pieces great. I’m enjoying it.
customer_reviews.author: Southern girl

customer_reviews.title: Love! Love
customer_reviews.text: Love ! Love ! Love ! Perfect for our 7 day cruise.
customer_reviews.author: Shaquana Perry

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works very good. Bought it for a cruise-hope they allow this
customer_reviews.author: JTC

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little iron especially for all those little quitling projects!
customer_reviews.author: Tommy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for sewing/Quilting
customer_reviews.text: I’m in the UK and was amazed how quick it arrived. Brilliant for the small pieces. The cord is not very flexible and sometimes annoyed me but that’s just being picky.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Goodwin

customer_reviews.title: Travel Compact Iron
customer_reviews.text: This little iron is very powerful. I bought it for my son to use at college and he likes it. The cord can get in the way at times but otherwise it is an excellent product. I would recommend this iron.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Small, but works good
customer_reviews.text: It is nice for traveling, but would not recommend for daily use. It is so small and takes awhile to iron your every day clothing.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does not heat up or steam for serious ironing
customer_reviews.text: This is good for any serious ironing. It does not heat up and steam to a level one can iron cotton clothes. Not worth the money. It also tends to leak.
customer_reviews.author: Arvind Gireesh

customer_reviews.title: What an amazing iron!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely perfect for traveling or for home . Powerful, compact, well thought out. Fits anywhere so taking it with you on a trip is a breeze. Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Tebary

customer_reviews.title: FAULTY IRON DOES NOT WORK --Does not heat, will not heat, I have not been able to use it once
customer_reviews.text: My iron does not work. Period. I plugged it in, selected the correct voltage setting, and waited. and waited and waited and waited, and am still waiting for it too heat up. I would like my money back please
customer_reviews.author: Anne Shops Frequently

customer_reviews.title: Dual voltage!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent for the dual voltage that actually WORKS .You need to notice that or it can be fried. My roommate really does the stupid thing.
customer_reviews.author: carden & associates

customer_reviews.title: Returned replacement
customer_reviews.text: Iron did not produce steam. Followed directions explicitly. Light on iron never went out indicating it was not hot enough for steam or ironing. Iron and box looked previously opened and looked used. Was sent a replacement even after I got a refund. Did not plug it in to try it as it looked pretty much the same as the first one. Box was worse. Not taped shut, one side of the box completely unglued exposing the contents. Same scratches on the temperature setting knob. It may have worked but didn't bother to try it. Returned it also. I upgraded the review to 2 stars as they did send a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: G.Teague

customer_reviews.title: This is exactly as advertised
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly as advertised.Kids like it than the floss pick.
customer_reviews.author: Venita Wells

customer_reviews.title: It's a travel iron so not much power
customer_reviews.text: You know, it's a travel iron so doesn't pack a lot of punch. But if you add the steam to it, it does what you need to do. Just don't except deep creases in your shirt. But great in size, will easily fit in a backpack.
customer_reviews.author: jonathan kazemi

customer_reviews.title: Not a bad price but worthless because it won't heat up and make steam.
customer_reviews.text: Returned this travel iron after two frustrating days of trying to get it to work. I had it on max heat and pushed in the steam button but it only barely heated up at all and never did make steam. All it did was leak the water all over the shirt I was trying to iron the first day, and the quilt squares I was trying to iron the second day of trying. Its a cute size, but that doesn't matter if it doesn't work! The sellers were very helpful and gave my a refund right away, I would buy items from this seller again, just not this travel iron.
customer_reviews.author: Man8tee

customer_reviews.title: Started out fine, but .....
customer_reviews.text: I got this iron to use in my sewing room...to press seams while quilting and it worked very well for the first few months. But now, it won't get hot. It barely gets warm and will not press seams open, so it is useless for my needs. Very disappointed. **EDIT.....After I posted the above review, I was contacted by the seller who then refunded the purchase price of the iron since it no longer works. Truly appreciated as they did not have to do that! The iron still does not work, but the refund helps. Hopefully, everyone else will have better luck with their actual iron. I really did like it....while it was working!
customer_reviews.author: Mary F.

customer_reviews.title: Originally loved but now...
customer_reviews.text: Originally loved this because it does produce steam. But for some reason the knob will freeze when the iron gets hot and you cannot turn the dial. Too late to return it now. Update: I was contacted after leaving review and sent a replacement. My replacement does not get as hot as first iron but so far the knob does not stick. I mainly use this in my craft room to get wrinkles out of my fat quarters. Replacement is ok but obviously not as good as a full size iron. Changed from 2 to 3 stars because a replacement was sent without me asking for one. Good CS.
customer_reviews.author: Savvy Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Portable, hot, perfect for sewing classes.
customer_reviews.text: Very portable, even has a little pouch to carry in with my sewing machine. Very hot, even has steam. Don't forget to empty the water before packing it away.
customer_reviews.author: LRW

customer_reviews.title: Great Quilting Iron!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to have on hand for quilting. It heats up super fast, very portable, easy on the hand to use and has a carry pouch. Would recommend for travel or quilting!
customer_reviews.author: SheerIdeas

customer_reviews.title: Great iron
customer_reviews.text: I don't iron. I own a steamer. Bought this travel iron because I purchased iron on labels with my mother's name on them, so I can iron the labels on her 12 panties I just bought, since she complained that she doesn't have any at the nursing home she resides. I am only going to iron on these labels on all her pajamas. This heats all very well, and irons great. This was a great purchase. Very happy with this purchase, and recommend this iron to anyone looking for one.
customer_reviews.author: Enid in Puerto Rico

customer_reviews.title: Little gem
customer_reviews.text: My husband surprised me with this little gem. I love it, heats up quickly, steams, no spitting. I am learning to quilt and keep it next to my sewing machine to press the seams.
customer_reviews.author: Pat U

customer_reviews.title: Gets very hot!
customer_reviews.text: I am pleased with this little craft iron. It gets very hot and is small enough for me to use on my craft table. Be forewarned that you should have a heat proof mat or something heat proof to set the iron on when in use. The only drawback is that it does not turn off automatically. Twice I have forgotten to unplug the iron and the thought flashed through my mind in the middle of the night!
customer_reviews.author: Debra Carol

customer_reviews.title: Little iron easy on wrists big on power!
customer_reviews.text: I really wasn't expecting much. It's so tiny and cute. But this baby gets super hot! It is perfect for me I always find regular irons top big and bulky and have hard time controlling where it goes. This is just lovely to use! It comes with a lovely bag, and a cloth guard for delicate fabrics. Really couldn't be happier!
customer_reviews.author: Delina Storm

customer_reviews.title: Love this for my crafts.
customer_reviews.text: The iron is lightweight and comfortable in your hand. The steam feature works great. It is small and you can travel with it. I use it for my crafts and keep it on the table while I work to press the seams as I sew. It has been a great help in making masks. I look forward to using it when I make my quilt.
customer_reviews.author: S D Zamko

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely perfect, just what I needed. Perfect for travel or craft project. Love it. Used it right away, haven't had any issues with it. Totally perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Terra

customer_reviews.title: Perfect travel iron!
customer_reviews.text: This works like a charm! I bought this for a trip to Paris, since most hotels there do not provide irons in the room. I tried it out before I went, and it works great! I didnt experience any water leakage, and it was able to get all the wrinkles out of my clothes. Very good buy!
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Great craft iron
customer_reviews.text: I can sit at my sewing table and iron my cut outs at the same time, no back and forth to the my large ironing board. One problem I learned the hard way is NOT to over fill the water chamber, under fill it. I also board an Iron pad.
customer_reviews.author: Roseyred

customer_reviews.title: This product is the size of my palm and it's really easy to pack
customer_reviews.text: I get a couple of interviews and it's almost impossible to keep your suit wrinkleless while you travel a lot. This product is the size of my palm and it's really easy to pack. It works perfectly, too. Everyone who goes for a business meeting/interviews should get one. You will not regret it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smoooooooth
customer_reviews.text: I got this to use with heat transfer vinyl on small fabric squares I used to make ornaments. Heated up quickly and evenly. Perfect for what I needed. Ironed out wrinkles in the fabric super smoothly and transferred the vinyl without needing to apply much pressure. Long enough cord, as well.
customer_reviews.author: B3rL3igh

customer_reviews.title: Pleased with the product.
customer_reviews.text: Love this little iron. It heats up quickly, steam works very well. I got mine for grandkids' baby clothes, and it gets into the tiny seams, does little collars, sleeves, and cuffs just great. I am getting one for my daughter, too.
customer_reviews.author: dog lover

customer_reviews.title: its shape fits perfectly in your hand and its size makes it the perfect iron to keep near the sewing machine
customer_reviews.text: Every quilter should have this iron, its shape fits perfectly in your hand and its size makes it the perfect iron to keep near the sewing machine. You will not regret getting this.
customer_reviews.author: Mad Hatter

customer_reviews.title: Mini iron
customer_reviews.text: Heats up quickly and the cord is as long as a regular sized Orion. This iron is good for most fabric but I’ve found that it doesn’t work well with jean fabric.
customer_reviews.author: Snow A.

customer_reviews.title: Lady really likes the weight and it is really cute.
customer_reviews.text: Wife got to old to use the heavy iron and this one she can manage okay.
customer_reviews.author: Amz_zulu

customer_reviews.title: Great little iron!
customer_reviews.text: I love this little iron, I've only had it a week, but so far so good, it fits in the palm of my hand easy control, lots of steam but my hand stays cool.
customer_reviews.author: K.L. Bear

product_meta.title: SMAGREHO Mini Travel Steam Iron with Dual Voltage, Anti Slip Handle and Non-Stick Teflon Soleplate Iron
feature_bullets: Fast-Heat: 1.4-ounce water tank heats up quickly in 15 seconds, equipped with 1-touch steam control and 3 temperature settings
Dry and steam ironing: Versatile for any type of fabric to effortlessly remove wrinkles on time, makes you look more charming
Dual Voltage: Suit for travel anywhere in the world, just switch between 100 and 240 volts
Travel Iron: Measures approximately 5.2 x 3 x 3.1 inches, including travel bag, plastic measuring cup
Satisfaction Guaranteed: 1-year warranty and lifetime friendly customer service

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars361 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
